actions.text: Submitted in the Senate and held at the desk by unanimous consent.
Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution authorizing the use of the Hart Senate Office Building Atrium on March 5, 1990, for a performance by the Western Kentucky University Choir.

summary.text: Authorizes the use of the atrium of the Senate Hart Office Building on March 5, 1990, for a musical performance by the Western Kentucky University Choir.

titles.title: A resolution authorizing the use of the Hart Senate Office Building Atrium on March 5, 1990, for a performance by the Western Kentucky University Choir.
